applicant-name.name: WEIJING ENERGY STORAGE TECH CO LTD
纬景储能科技有限公司

invention-title: Alkaline flow battery and preparation method of composite electrode
一种碱性液流电池和复合电极的制备方法

abstract.p: The invention provides an alkaline flow battery and a preparation method of composite electrodes. The alkaline flow battery comprises at least one diaphragm, at least two composite electrodes, a first electrolyte solution and a second electrolyte solution, the diaphragms are arranged between every two adjacent composite electrodes; the composite electrode comprises a positive composite electrode, a negative composite electrode and a bipolar plate, and the positive composite electrode and the negative composite electrode are electrically connected with the two sides of the bipolar plate respectively; the positive composite electrode comprises a positive substrate and a nickel hydroxide module arranged on the positive substrate; the negative electrode composite electrode comprises a negative electrode substrate and a hydrogen storage alloy module arranged on the negative electrode substrate. According to the alkaline redox flow battery, the power density and the energy density of an original alkaline system redox flow battery are improved through the oxidation-reduction reaction of the nickel hydroxide module and the hydrogen storage alloy module in the electrolyte, and the hydrogen evolution and oxygen evolution phenomena possibly generated by the original alkaline redox flow battery system are effectively inhibited, so that the operation risk of the alkaline redox flow battery is reduced.

本公开提供了一种碱性液流电池和复合电极的制备方法，碱性液流电池包括：至少一个隔膜，以及至少两个复合电极，第一电解质溶液、第二电解质溶液；隔膜设置于每两个相邻的复合电极之间；复合电极包括正极复合电极、负极复合电极和双极板，正极复合电极和负极复合电极分别与双极板的两侧电气连接；正极复合电极包括正极基板和设置于正极基板上的氢氧化镍模块；负极复合电极包括负极基板和设置于负极基板上的储氢合金模块。该碱性液流电池通过氢氧化镍模块与储氢合金模块，在电解液中发生的氧化还原反应，提高了原碱性体系液流电池的功率密度和能量密度，并有效抑制原碱性液流电池体系可能产生的析氢析氧现象，从而降低了碱性液流电池的运行风险。
